name: Prototype (itch) (Sujal)
description:
This is a Prototype Idea.

Just wander around, check the setting, aesthetics, controls and leave feedback to us.

Give your Suggestions And Feedback at our Discord, Also if you want to be a part of the game.

Controls:

  • ASDW or ARROW keys to move(run) around.
  • Hold C to crouch. 
  • Hold SHIFT to walk while moving.
  • ESC to get out of Fullscreen

What's New?

  • Prototype map
  • 3rd Person Controller
  • Cinematic Camera
